artist: Delineator: Charles Eisen; Engraver: Étienne Ficquet
description: bust length portrait of man facing right and looking out; shoulder length hair; open neck shirt; in a center oval; a drape at right and a partially finished portrait at left; on a pedestal
dimension:
4 × 3 13/16 in. (10.16 × 9.68 cm) (image)
11 3/4 × 9 5/8 in. (29.85 × 24.45 cm) (sheet, including 1 1/4" strip glued to top edge)
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: C. Eisen del.   Ficquet sculp. \\ JURIEN \\ OVENS, \\ ÉLEVE DE REMBRANT |  on sheet in pencil: 2-148
title: Portrait of Jurien Ovens
